$ZIM dividends are worth it here period.

$ZIM train passed in 2021 and 2022 with EPS of $40 and distributing nearly 50% in dividends. Those who invested at $11 ish a share hit the jackpot.  Earnings will now decline to $13 in 2023 and then $5 in 2024. So best case scenario it's a 7-8 annual dividend and then 2-3 in 2024. What you make in dividends is likely to be lost by the share depreciation. For me it became a value trap
